sentences.en: Beads of perspiration stood out on his forehead.
Chantal was writhing in pain and bathed in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 夏恩托痛苦地翻来覆去，汗水淋淋。

sentences.en: During fever a large quantity of fluid is lost in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 发烧时，大量水分会通过排汗而丧失。

sentences.en: He mopped perspiration from his forehead.
He wiped the beads of perspiration (= drops ) from his brow.
His forehead was dripping with perspiration.
His hands were wet with perspiration.
It is so hot that my clothes are wet with perspiration.
sentences.cn: 天太热了,我的衣服被汗水湿透了.

sentences.en: It was then he awoke, socked in perspiration, and couldn't sleep again.
sentences.cn: 正在这时他醒了, 浑身都是汗, 再也不能入睡.
汗水使他的头发粘在一起.

sentences.en: Perspiration dampened her face and neck.
sentences.cn: 她的脸和脖子都汗津津的。

sentences.en: She could see his face now, his eyes wild and his skin glistening with perspiration.
sentences.cn: 她现在可以看见他的脸了，他的眼睛瞪得溜圆，皮肤上闪着汗水。

sentences.en: She was writhing in pain, bathed in perspiration.
sentences.cn: 她痛苦地扭动着，全身都汗湿了。

sentences.en: The perspiration was running down my back.

trans.tran_en: liquid that appears on your skin when you are hot or nervous
